lines.text:
[Trivia Scan]
In what episode of Star Trek do Kirk and Spock fight a duel to the death
The Wrath of Too Many Cans
[William Shatner shoots him a look]

[Trivia Scan]
Who created Superman?
My mother and father.

[Photon Photos]
Kim, I'm going to you again. What was this from?
Oh, it's "Killers from Outer Space"!
How do you know these things?

[Introductions]
Every captain has a stellar Number One, but tonight, Craig has settled for a steaming Number Two, Ford Kiernan!
[Ford shakes his head in annoyance]

[Trivia Scan]
Whose soon to be published autobiography is entitled "Beaming up and getting off" ?
[Buzzes in and points to himself, mouth open]
Absolutely correct! It's George Takei!
[Walter has a tantrum]
In The Wrath of Khan...
[Buzzes in and raises hand]
Oh my God, you haven't even waited!
[Walter puts is hand down, hoping it's him again]
It is you! In the Wrath of Khan, Chekov is made first officer of which ship?
The Hindenburg!
